original: Majjhima Nikāya 135
analyzed: majjhima nikāya

original: Cūḷakammavibhaṅgasutta
analyzed: cūḷa kamma vibhaṅga sutta

original: Evaṁ me sutaṁ—
analyzed: evam me suta

original: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā sāvatthiyaṁ viharati jetavane, anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
analyzed: ekam samayam bhagavā sāvatthiyam viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme

original: Atha kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhiṁ sammodi.
analyzed: atha kho subhaḥ māṇavaḥ todeyya puttaḥ yena bhagavā tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā bhagavatā saddhim sammodi

original: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi. Ekamantaṁ nisinno kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
analyzed: sammodanīyam katham sāraṇīyam vītisāretvā ekamantam nisīdi ekamantam nisinnaḥ kho subhaḥ māṇavaḥ todeyya puttaḥ bhagavantam etat avoca

original: “Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussānaṁyeva sataṁ manussabhūtānaṁ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bho gotama hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena manussā anayā iva satam manussa bhūtānam dissanti hīna ppaṇīta tā

original: Dissanti hi, bho gotama, manussā appāyukā, dissanti dīghāyukā;
analyzed: dissanti hi bho gotama manussāḥ appāyukāḥ dissanti dīghāyukā

original: dissanti bavhābādhā, dissanti appābādhā;
analyzed: dissanti bavhābādhā dissanti appābādhā

original: dissanti dubbaṇṇā, dissanti vaṇṇavanto;
analyzed: dissanti dubbaṇṇāḥ dissanti vaṇṇavanto

original: dissanti appesakkhā, dissanti mahesakkhā;
analyzed: dissanti appesakkhāḥ dissanti mahesakkhāḥ

original: dissanti appabhogā, dissanti mahābhogā;
analyzed: dissanti appabhogā dissanti mahā bhogā

original: dissanti nīcakulīnā, dissanti uccākulīnā;
analyzed: dissanti nīca kulīnā dissanti ucca akulīnā

original: dissanti duppaññā, dissanti paññavanto.
analyzed: dissanti duppaññāḥ dissanti paññavanto

original: Ko nu kho, bho gotama, hetu ko paccayo yena manussānaṁyeva sataṁ manussabhūtānaṁ dissanti hīnappaṇītatā”ti?
analyzed: kaḥ nu kho bho gotama hetu kaḥ paccayaḥ yena manussā anayā iva satam manussa bhūtānam dissanti hīna ppaṇīta tā ati

original: “Kammassakā, māṇava, sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammappaṭisaraṇā.
analyzed: kammassakā māṇava sattā kamma dāyādā kamma yonī kamma bandhū kamma ppaṭisaraṇā

original: Kammaṁ satte vibhajati yadidaṁ—
analyzed: kammam satte vibhajati

original: hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
analyzed: hīna ppaṇīta tāya ati

original: “Na kho ahaṁ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājānāmi.
analyzed: na kho aham imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena attham a vibhattassa vitthārena attham ājānāmi

original: Sādhu me bhavaṁ gotamo tathā dhammaṁ desetu yathā ahaṁ imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena atthaṁ avibhattassa vitthārena atthaṁ ājāneyyan”ti.
analyzed: sādhu me bhavam gotamaḥ tathā dhammam desetu yathā aham imassa bhoto gotamassa saṅkhittena bhāsitassa vitthārena attham avibhattassa vitthārena attham ājāneyyanti

original: “Tena hi, māṇava, suṇāhi, sādhukaṁ manasi karohi; bhāsissāmī”ti.
analyzed: tena hi māṇava suṇāhi sādhukam manasi karohi bhāsissāmi iti

original: “Evaṁ, bho”ti kho subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavato paccassosi.
analyzed: eva bhoti kho subhaḥ māṇavaḥ todeyya putto bhagavataḥ paccassosi

original: Bhagavā etadavoca:
analyzed: bhagavān etat avoca

original: “Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesu.
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā pāṇa atipātī hoti luddaḥ lohita pāṇi hata pahate niviṭṭhaḥ adaya āpannaḥ pāṇa bhūtesu

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam sa mattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appāyuko hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appāyukaḥ hoti

original: Appāyukasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: pāṇātipātī hoti luddo lohitapāṇi hatapahate niviṭṭho adayāpanno pāṇabhūtesu.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātī hoti luddaḥ lohita pāṇi hata pahate niviṭṭhaḥ adaya āpannaḥ pāṇabhūtesu

original: Idha pana, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
analyzed: idha pana māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā pāṇa atipātam pahāya pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti nihita daṇḍaḥ nihita satthaḥ lajjī dayā āpannaḥ sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī viharati

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam samattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati dīghāyuko hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati dīgha āyukaḥ hoti

original: Dīghāyukasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: pāṇātipātaṁ pahāya pāṇātipātā paṭivirato hoti nihitadaṇḍo nihitasattho, lajjī dayāpanno sabbapāṇabhūtahitānukampī viharati.
analyzed: pāṇa atipātam pahāya pāṇa atipātā paṭivirataḥ hoti nihita daṇḍaḥ nihita satthaḥ lajjī dayā āpannaḥ sabba pāṇa bhūta hita anukampī viharati

original: Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā sattānaṁ viheṭhakajātiko hoti, pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā.
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā sattānam viheṭhaka jātikaḥ hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam sa mattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati bavhābādho hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati bavhābādhaḥ hoti

original: Bavhābādhasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: sattānaṁ viheṭhakajātiko hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā.
analyzed: sattānam viheṭhaka jātikaḥ hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā

original: Idha pana, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā.
analyzed: idha pana māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam samattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appābādho hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appa ābādhaḥ hoti

original: Appābādhasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: sattānaṁ aviheṭhakajātiko hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā.
analyzed: sattānam a viheṭhaka jātikaḥ hoti pāṇinā vā leḍḍunā vā daṇḍena vā satthena vā

original: Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo.
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā kodhanaḥ hoti upāyāsa bahulaḥ

original: Appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
analyzed: appampi vuttaḥ samānaḥ abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhīyati kopam ca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam sa mattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati dubbaṇṇo hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati dubbaṇṇaḥ hoti

original: Dubbaṇṇasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: kodhano hoti upāyāsabahulo;
analyzed: kodhanaḥ hoti upāyāsa bahulaḥ

original: appampi vutto samāno abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhīyati kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
analyzed: appampi vuttaḥ samānaḥ abhisajjati kuppati byāpajjati patiṭṭhīyati kopam ca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti

original: Idha pana, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā akkodhano hoti anupāyāsabahulo;
analyzed: idha pana māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā akkodhanaḥ hoti an upāyāsa bahulaḥ

original: bahumpi vutto samāno nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patiṭṭhīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
analyzed: bahum pi vuttaḥ samānaḥ na abhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patiṭṭhīyati na kopam ca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam samattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati pāsādiko hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati pāsādikaḥ hoti

original: Pāsādikasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: pāsādika savattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: akkodhano hoti anupāyāsabahulo;
analyzed: a kkodhanaḥ hoti an upāyāsa bahulaḥ

original: bahumpi vutto samāno nābhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patiṭṭhīyati na kopañca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti.
analyzed: bahum pi vuttaḥ samānaḥ na abhisajjati na kuppati na byāpajjati na patiṭṭhīyati na kopam ca dosañca appaccayañca pātukaroti

original: Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā issāmanako hoti;
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā issāmanakaḥ hoti

original: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issati upadussati issaṁ bandhati.
analyzed: para lābha sakkāra garukāra mānana vandana pūjanāsu issati upadussati issam bandhati

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam sa mattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appesakkho hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appesakkhaḥ hoti

original: Appesakkhasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: esā māṇava paṭipadā yat idam

original: issāmanako hoti;
analyzed: issāmanakaḥ hoti

original: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu issati upadussati issaṁ bandhati.
analyzed: para lābha sakkāra garukāra mānana vandana pūjanāsu issati upadussati issam bandhati

original: Idha pana, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā anissāmanako hoti;
analyzed: idha pana māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā a nissāmanakaḥ hoti

original: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issaṁ bandhati.
analyzed: para lābha sakkāra garukāra mānana vandana pūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issam bandhati

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam samattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati mahesakkho hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati mahesakkhaḥ hoti

original: Mahesakkhasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: mahesakkhasavattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadā yat idam

original: anissāmanako hoti;
analyzed: a nissāmanakaḥ hoti

original: paralābhasakkāragarukāramānanavandanapūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issaṁ bandhati.
analyzed: para lābha sakkāra garukāra mānana vandana pūjanāsu na issati na upadussati na issam bandhati

original: Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyya āvasatha padīpeyya

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam sa mattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā apāyaṁ duggatiṁ vinipātaṁ nirayaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appabhogo hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā apāyam duggatim vinipātam nirayam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati appabhogaḥ hoti

original: Appabhogasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: appabhoga savattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: na dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyya āvasatha padīpeyya

original: Idha pana, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: idha pana māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyya āvasatha padīpeyya

original: So tena kammena evaṁ samattena evaṁ samādinnena kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati.
analyzed: so tena kammena evam samattena evam samādinnena kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati

original: No ce kāyassa bhedā paraṁ maraṇā sugatiṁ saggaṁ lokaṁ upapajjati, sace manussattaṁ āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati mahābhogo hoti.
analyzed: no ce kāyassa bhedā param maraṇā sugatim saggam lokam upapajjati sace manussattam āgacchati yattha yattha paccājāyati mahā bhogaḥ hoti

original: Mahābhogasaṁvattanikā esā, māṇava, paṭipadā yadidaṁ—
analyzed: mahā bhoga savattanikā esā māṇava paṭipadā yat ida

original: dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annaṁ pānaṁ vatthaṁ yānaṁ mālāgandhavilepanaṁ seyyāvasathapadīpeyyaṁ.
analyzed: dātā hoti samaṇassa vā brāhmaṇassa vā annam pānam vattham yānam mālā gandha vilepanam seyya āvasatha padīpeyya

original: Idha, māṇava, ekacco itthī vā puriso vā thaddho hoti atimānī—
analyzed: idha māṇava ekaccaḥ itthī vā purisaḥ vā thaddhaḥ hoti atimānī

original: abhivādetabbaṁ na abhivādeti, paccuṭṭhātabbaṁ na paccuṭṭheti, āsanārahassa na āsanaṁ

original: Kammassakā, māṇava, sattā kammadāyādā kammayonī kammabandhū kammappaṭisaraṇā.
analyzed: kammassakā māṇava sattā kamma dāyādā kamma yonī kamma bandhū kamma ppaṭisaraṇā

original: Kammaṁ satte vibhajati yadidaṁ—
analyzed: kammam satte vibhajati

original: hīnappaṇītatāyā”ti.
analyzed: hīna ppaṇīta tāya ati

original: Evaṁ vutte, subho māṇavo todeyyaputto bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:

original: “abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama, abhikkantaṁ, bho gotama.

original: Seyyathāpi, bho gotama, nikkujjitaṁ vā ukkujjeyya, paṭicchannaṁ vā vivareyya, mūḷhassa
analyzed: seyyathā api bho gotama nikkujjitam vā ukkujjeyya paṭicchannam vā vivareyya mūḷhassa

original: vā maggaṁ ācikkheyya, andhakāre vā telapajjotaṁ dhāreyya: ‘cakkhumanto rūpāni dakkhantī’ti;
analyzed: vā maggam ācikkheyya andhakāre vā tela pajjotam dhāreyya cakkhumantaḥ rūpāni dakkhanti iti

original: evamevaṁ bhotā gotamena anekapariyāyena dhammo pakāsito.
analyzed: evam evam bhotā gotamena aneka pariyāyena dhammo pakāsito

original: Esāhaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ saraṇaṁ gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhusaṅghañca.
analyzed: esā aham bhavantam gotamam saraṇam gacchāmi dhammañca bhikkhu saṅghañca

original: Upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
analyzed: upāsakam mam bhavam gotamaḥ dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetam saraṇam gatanti

original: Cūḷakammavibhaṅgasuttaṁ niṭṭhitaṁ pañcamaṁ.
analyzed: cūḷakammavibhaṅga suttam niṭṭhitam pañcama
